meanings.definition: The act or process of displaying an image in a pixelated form.
meanings.sent1: The pixelation of the photo made it hard to recognize the faces.
meanings.sent2: The video game character's movements were affected by the pixelation on the screen.
meanings.sent3: The artist intentionally added pixelation to the painting for a unique effect.
meanings.sent4: The pixelation of the map gave it a retro, nostalgic feel.
meanings.sent5: The pixelation of the logo was so severe that it looked like a mosaic of colors.
